<?php
/**
 * gallery detail view
 *
 */
class PhenotypeInclude_1106 extends PhenotypeInclude
{

  public $id = 1106;

  function display()
  {
    global $myDB;
    global $myApp;
    global $myPage;
    global $myRequest;


    $gal_id = $myRequest->getI("gal_id");

    // We expect urls like xxxx/imageA,B.html
    // We want A and B

    $_smartUID = split(",",$myRequest->get("smartUID"));

    $patterns = "/[^0-9]*/";
    $nr = preg_replace($patterns,"",$_smartUID[0]);
    $pag_id_mik = preg_replace($patterns,"",$_smartUID[1]);

    $url_overview = url_for_page($pag_id_mik);


    $myCO = new CO_Gallery($gal_id);
    if ($myCO->isLoaded() AND $myCO->status==1)
    {
      $c = count ($myCO->getImagesArray());
      // Initialisieren des Smartyzugriffs
      eval ($this->initRendering());
      $mySmarty->assign("gallery",$myCO);

      // get Image information
      $_image = $myCO->getImageArray($nr);
      $mySmarty->assign("image",$_image);

      $url_forward ="";
      $url_backward ="";
      if ($nr>1)
      {
        $smartUID = "image".($nr-1).",".$pag_id_mik.".html";
        $url_backward = url_for_page(PhenotypeApplication::pag_id_galleryview,array("gal_id"=>$myCO->id),null,$smartUID);
      }
      if ($nr<$c)
      {
        $smartUID = "image".($nr+1).",".$pag_id_mik.".html";
        $url_forward = url_for_page(PhenotypeApplication::pag_id_galleryview,array("gal_id"=>$myCO->id),null,$smartUID);
      }
      $mySmarty->assign("url_forward",$url_forward);
      $mySmarty->assign("url_backward",$url_backward);
      $mySmarty->assign("url_overview",$url_overview);
      $mySmarty->display($TPL_1);
    }
  }
}
?>
